item.title: Android HAL (Hardware Abstraction Layer)
item.description: Hardare Abstraction Layer is the software component which abstracts the hardware . In one context operating system is a hardware abstraction layer . In another context we can say a pheripheral driver is a hardware abstraction layer for that pheripheral hardware . Or some time we can use userspace drievers which does the job of abstracting the hardware . Hardware Abstraction Layer in the context of android operating system is a binary blob which will talk to hardware .
